Html:
Joe,

As published build 49152 builds but fails to run because it can't find resource CommonFontResources.xaml.  The reason is this file is included in the folder tree, but is NOT actually listed as part of the project.  Include it and all is well.

Trevor

My mistake.  Thanks for catching that.  I just checked in the fix.

There are three different project versions in the tree (.Net3.5SP1/VS2008, 3.5SP1/2010, 4.0/2010).  Depending on how I am or anyone else is working on the project the other two versions don't get updated and have sometimes fallen out of sync.  Usually I fix it up right away but I didn't notice this one.

Once Visual Studio 2010 is readily available I'll drop the 2008 version of the project and this won't happen as much anymore.
